0.author: CatalinaAlbornoz
0.content: For all posts related to FlamingPy, the Python library for efficient simulations of error correction in fault-tolerant quantum computers developed by Xanadu. This includes usage, help, and development. See the FlamingPy GitHub 2 and Documentation 3 for more details.1
